dc_title_s: Carte du pais de Loudunois.; Carte dv pais de Lovdvnois
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Inscription reads "Picquet incidit 1620." Included in Leclerc's 1621 edition of "Théatre géographique du Royaume de France". From the Composite Atlas of France, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 34 x 40 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Leclerc, Jean, 1560-1621.,Picquet, engraver.,Leclerc, Jean, 1560-1621, cartographer.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner. Composite Atlas of France.
